config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration _transientMode is used to determine whether to use a TransientJournal or a PersistentJournal in the journal() method. If _transientMode is true, a TransientJournal is returned, otherwise a PersistentJournal is created with specific parameters.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _transientMode configuration depends on the specific conditions in the system. If the condition for _transientMode to be true is met, then the TransientJournal will be used. Otherwise, the PersistentJournal will be created.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _transientMode configuration option on the system is related to the type of journal used. Using a TransientJournal may have different performance characteristics compared to a PersistentJournal with specific parameters. This can affect system performance and resource usage.
